item.title: Creating Color Schemes with LESS Color Functions - Envato Tuts+ Web Design Tutorial
item.description:
Creating Color Schemes with LESS Color Functions - Envato Tuts+ Web Design Tutorial

LESS provides a handful of functions which make defining and manipulating colors super easy. In this tutorial we are going to walk through a number of them, helping you control colors, produce better color pairings and keep them organized. | Difficulty: Intermediate; Length: Medium; Tags: LESS, Color Theory
